description: Pre-task checklist that agents must complete before starting work. This ensures mandatory behaviors are followed.

read_context_index.notes: Must read master context index first

checked_mcp_server.action: Verify MCP server is accessible and understand which functions to use
checked_mcp_server.notes: Must verify MCP server availability before starting

claimed_task_in_queue.notes: Must claim task in task queue before starting work

checked_file_locks.notes: Must check for file locks before editing files

loaded_required_files.notes: Must load all required context files for task type

understood_task_scope.notes: Must understand what the task requires and what it does NOT require

required_mcp_calls.description: MCP calls that must be made during this task (varies by task type)

validation_required.description: Validation steps that must be completed before task is done

compliance_notes.description: Notes about compliance with mandatory behaviors

usage_instructions.step_1: Agent creates checklist instance for their task
usage_instructions.step_2: Agent completes all required checklist items
usage_instructions.step_3: Agent logs checklist completion in task queue
usage_instructions.step_4: Agent starts work only after checklist is complete
usage_instructions.step_5: Reviewer agent verifies checklist was completed before approving task
